duties_responsibilities.duty: Be the “voice of the customer” in the company’s facilities, and manage multiple sales orders concurrently.
Coordinate with engineering, approval of submittals, and scheduling with production and on-site delivery.
Act as the main point of contact for customers and vendors on assigned sales orders, monitor project costs, and ensure compliance with contract documents.
Provide direction and oversight to all aspects of the project team, prepare change order proposals, and monitor progress and status of the projects.
Ensure continuous improvement of processes and systems, coordinate site visits, work with customers, and manage the long-term schedule to minimize conflicts with operational restrictions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or equivalent work experience (Master's preferred)
